items.text: Arrive in Hyderabad and check into your hotel.
Lunch at a famous biryani spot in RTC X Roads/Ashok Nagar

Visit the iconic Charminar

A historic monument and mosque, built in 1591, famous for its four minarets.

Visit the nearby Mecca Masjid

One of the oldest and largest mosques in India, built with soil from Mecca.

Stroll along Tank Bund

A popular boulevard with statues of famous personalities, offering a great view of Hussain Sagar lake.
Dinner at Shadab for mutton delicacies

Night visit to Durgam Cheruvu Bridge

A modern cable-stayed bridge with beautiful lighting, offering stunning views of the lake.

Morning exploration of the majestic Golconda Fort

A historic fortress known for its acoustics and a former diamond trading center.
Lunch at Kamat Hotel near Birla Science Centre

Afternoon visit to the B.M. Birla Science Centre

A complex including a science museum, planetarium, and art gallery.

Evening drive to Ananthagiri Hills (approx. 2-3 hours)

A dense forest region with beautiful hills, and the birthplace of the Musi river.
Check into a resort for an overnight stay in Ananthagiri.
Enjoy the sunrise and explore the lush forests of Ananthagiri.

Kayaking at Kotepally Reservoir

A serene reservoir perfect for kayaking and boating amidst nature.

Visit the Anantha Padmanabha Swamy Temple

An ancient Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Vishnu, located in the scenic Ananthagiri hills.
Lunch in Ananthagiri before heading to the station.
Return train from Vikarabad (VKB): 16584 LUR YPR EXPRESS, departs 7:40 PM, arrives YPR 7:40 AM.

otherPlaces.name: Ramoji Film City
otherPlaces.description: The world's largest film studio complex, offering tours, shows, and an amusement park. Requires a full day to explore.

otherPlaces.name: Chowmahalla Palace
otherPlaces.description: The magnificent palace of the Nizams, showcasing their opulent lifestyle, vintage car collection, and stunning architecture.

otherPlaces.name: Salar Jung Museum
otherPlaces.description: Features one of the world's largest one-man collections of antiques, art, and artifacts from across the globe.

otherPlaces.name: Hussain Sagar Lake
otherPlaces.description: A large, heart-shaped lake with a famous Buddha statue in the middle. Great for an evening stroll, boat ride, and enjoying the city lights.
